structure.unit: ARTICLE LXXXV. CHARTER REVIEW TASK FORCE

text.section:
Sec. 2-1191. Created; duties.
There is hereby created a Charter Review Task Force which shall consist of thirteen members comprised of each County Commissioner or his or her designee.
The Task Force shall review the Home Rule Charter or Miami-Dade County in its entirety and shall prepare and submit to this Board written recommendations setting forth any proposed amendments or revisions to the Charter.
All proceedings or the Charter Review Task Force shall be conducted in accordance with the Government in the Sunshine Law (§ 286.011, Fla. Stats.) and the Citizens' Bill of Rights of the Miami-Dade County Home Rule Charter. The Task Force shall be deemed an "agency" for the purposes of the Public Records Law (§ 119, Fla. Stats.).
The County Manager shall convene a meeting of the Task Force on or before January 14, 2000 and the Task Force shall submit its written recommendations to this Board on or before July 31, 2001.
